name: Magellan
text:
[On Play] DON!! -1: Your opponent returns 1 of their DON!! cards on the field to their DON!! deck.
[Opponent's Turn] When this Character is K.O.'ed, your opponent returns 2 of their DON!! cards on the field to their DON!! deck.

effect.text: Your opponent returns 1 of their DON!! cards on the field to their DON!! deck.
When this Character is K.O.'ed, your opponent returns 2 of their DON!! cards on the field to their DON!! deck.
